short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for displaying a satoshi's age and rarity for all Ordinal listings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
satStats is a browser extension that displays satributes on Ordinal inscriptions. View a satoshi's age and rarity on your favorite Ordinal marketplaces like MagicEden and OrdinalsWallet!

NEW FEATURE: You can now scan your Bitcoin address for rare and notable sats!

Free and open source: https://github.com/RabbiGains-eth/satStats/
